text: Alaha ne tuhade ute harama (naja'iza) kita hai kevala muradara ate khuna nu ate sura de masa nu ate jisa te alaha tom binam kise hora da nama li'a gi'a hove. Phira jihara bada majabura ho jave, uha na iduka hove ate na hi sima da ulaghana karana vala hove tam usa upara ko'i papa nahim. Besaka alaha mu'afa karana vala hai, rahimata vala hai
